00039 namespace ctk {

00041 /* Forward declaration */
00042 class SpeThread;

00047 class SpeThreadGroup {
00048         SpeImage m_image;
00049         ctk_spe_thread_group_t m_group;
00050         int *m_status;
00051         bool m_started;
00052         int m_count;
00053 
00054     public:
00056         SpeThreadGroup(int maxThreads, int options = 0) : m_image(NULL),
00057             m_group(NULL), m_status(NULL), m_started(false), m_count(0)
00058         {
00059             int ret = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_create(&m_group, maxThreads, 0);
00060             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00061                 throw Error(ret);
00062             m_status = new int[maxThreads];
00063         }
00064 
00066         SpeThreadGroup(int nThreads, SpeImage &image)
00067             : m_image(image), m_group(NULL), m_status(NULL),
00068               m_started(false), m_count(nThreads) { }
00069 
00071         SpeThreadGroup(int nThreads, ctk_spe_program_t &program)
00072             : m_image(program), m_group(NULL), m_status(NULL), 
00073               m_started(false), m_count(nThreads) { }
00074 
00076         SpeThreadGroup(int nThreads, const char *fname)
00077             : m_image(fname), m_group(NULL), m_status(NULL), 
00078               m_started(false), m_count(nThreads) { }
00079 
00081         SpeThreadGroup(int nThreads, SpeImage &image, void *argp,
00082             void *envp, int flags = 0)
00083             : m_image(NULL), m_group(NULL), m_status(NULL), 
00084               m_started(false), m_count(0)
00085         {
00086             int ret = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_create_spmd(&m_group, 
00087                 nThreads, image.getProgram(), argp, envp, flags);
00088             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00089                 throw Error(ret);
00090             m_count = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_get_threads_count(m_group);
00091             m_status = new int[m_count];
00092             if ((flags & CTK_SPE_DONT_START) == 0)
00093                 m_started = true;
00094         }
00095 
00097         SpeThreadGroup(int nThreads, ctk_spe_program_t &program, 
00098             void *argp, void *envp, int flags = 0) : m_image(NULL), 
00099             m_group(NULL), m_status(NULL), m_started(false), m_count(0)
00100         {
00101             int ret = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_create_spmd(&m_group, 
00102                 nThreads, &program, argp, envp, flags);
00103             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00104                 throw Error(ret);
00105             m_count = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_get_threads_count(m_group);
00106             m_status = new int[m_count];
00107             if ((flags & CTK_SPE_DONT_START) == 0)
00108                 m_started = true;
00109         }
00110 
00112         SpeThreadGroup(int nThreads, const char *fname, 
00113             void *argp, void *envp, int flags = 0) : m_image(NULL),
00114             m_group(NULL), m_status(NULL), m_started(false), m_count(0)
00115         {
00116             SpeImage image(fname);
00117             int ret = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_create_spmd(&m_group, 
00118                 nThreads, image.getProgram(), argp, envp, flags);
00119             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00120                 throw Error(ret);
00121             m_count = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_get_threads_count(m_group);
00122             m_status = new int[m_count];
00123             if ((flags & CTK_SPE_DONT_START) == 0)
00124                 m_started = true;
00125         }
00126 
00128         ~SpeThreadGroup() {
00129             if (m_status != NULL)
00130                 delete m_status;
00131             if (m_group != NULL)
00132                 ::ctk_spe_thread_group_destroy(m_group);
00133         }
00134 
00140         void add(SpeThread &thread);
00141 
00147         void start(void *argp = NULL, void *envp = NULL, int flags = 0) {
00148             if (m_group != NULL) {
00149                 if (m_started)
00150                     throw Error(CTK_ERROR_SPE_ALREADY_RUNNING);
00151                 int ret = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_start(m_group, NULL);
00152                 if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00153                     throw Error(ret);
00154             } else if (m_image.getProgram() != NULL) {
00155                 int ret = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_create_spmd(&m_group, 
00156                         m_count, m_image.getProgram(), argp, envp, flags);
00157                 if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00158                     throw Error(ret);
00159                 m_count = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_get_threads_count(m_group);
00160                 m_status = new int[m_count];
00161             } else
00162                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_NULL_OBJECT);
00163             m_started = true;
00164         }
00165 
00171         void wait() {
00172             int ret = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_wait(m_group, m_status);
00173             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00174                 throw Error(ret);
00175             m_group = NULL;
00176         }
00177 
00182         int size() {
00183             return m_count;
00184         }
00185 
00190         int getExitCode(int index) {
00191             if (index < 0 || index >= m_count)
00192                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_OUT_OF_RANGE);
00193             if (m_started == false)
00194                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_BAD_SPE_STATUS);
00195             return CTK_SPE_EXIT_STATUS(m_status[index]);
00196         }
00197 
00203         bool isExited(int index) {
00204             if (index < 0 || index >= m_count)
00205                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_OUT_OF_RANGE);
00206             if (m_started == false)
00207                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_BAD_SPE_STATUS);
00208             return CTK_SPE_IF_EXITED(m_status[index]);
00209         }
00210 
00217         void writeMbox(unsigned int data) {
00218             int ret = ::ctk_mbox_group_write(m_group, data);
00219             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00220                 throw Error(ret);
00221         }
00222 
00229         void readMboxBlocking(unsigned int data[]) {
00230             int ret = ::ctk_mbox_group_read_block(m_group, data);
00231             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS) 
00232                 throw Error(ret);
00233         }
00234 
00241         void writeMboxBlocking(unsigned int data) {
00242             int ret = ::ctk_mbox_group_write_block(m_group, data);
00243             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00244                 throw Error(ret);
00245         }
00246 
00257         inline void
00258         writeSignalRegister(SignalRegister::reg reg, ctk_uint32_t data)
00259         {
00260             int ret = ::ctk_signal_group_write(m_group, (unsigned int)reg, data);
00261             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00262                 throw Error(ret);
00263         }
00264 
00271         inline void
00272         writeSignalRegister1(unsigned int data)
00273         {
00274             int ret = ::ctk_signal_group_write_reg1(m_group, data);
00275             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00276                 throw Error(ret);
00277         }
00278 
00285         inline void
00286         writeSignalRegister2(unsigned int data)
00287         {
00288             int ret = ::ctk_signal_group_write_reg2(m_group, data);
00289             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00290                 throw Error(ret);
00291         }
00292 
00294         class iterator {
00295             public:
00296                 ctk_spe_thread_t m_cursor;
00297                 explicit iterator(ctk_spe_thread_t p = 0) : m_cursor(p) { }
00298                 iterator& operator++() {
00299                     m_cursor = (ctk_spe_thread_t)(unsigned long)m_cursor->next;
00300                     return *this;
00301                 }
00302                 iterator operator++(int) {
00303                     ctk_spe_thread_t old = m_cursor;
00304                     m_cursor = (ctk_spe_thread_t)(unsigned long)m_cursor->next;
00305                     return iterator(old);
00306                 }
00307                 SpeThread operator*();
00308                 friend bool operator==(const iterator& x, const iterator& y) {
00309                     return x.m_cursor == y.m_cursor;
00310                 }
00311                 friend bool operator!=(const iterator& x, const iterator& y) {
00312                     return x.m_cursor != y.m_cursor;
00313                 }
00314         };
00315 
00316         iterator begin() { 
00317             if (m_group == NULL)
00318                 return iterator(NULL);
00319             return iterator((ctk_spe_thread_t)m_group->m_threads.head);
00320         }
00321         iterator end() {
00322             return iterator(NULL);
00323         }
00324 };
00325 
00326 };

00328 #include "SpeThread.hpp"

00330 namespace ctk {
00331 
00332 inline void SpeThreadGroup::add(SpeThread &thread) {
00333     if (m_started)
00334         throw Error(CTK_ERROR_SPE_ALREADY_RUNNING);
00335     int ret = ::ctk_spe_thread_group_add(m_group, thread.m_thread);
00336     if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00337         throw Error(ret);
00338 }
00339 
00340 inline SpeThread SpeThreadGroup::iterator::operator*() { 
00341     return SpeThread(m_cursor);
00342 }
